title: Real Italian lasagne Bolognese
ingredients: ['Bolognese sauce', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 shallot, minced', '1 carrot, chopped', '100g prosciutto or bacon, cubed', '300g minced pork', '300g minced beef', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'salt to taste', '1 glass red wine (about 180ml)', '600g peeled San Marzano tomatoes or passata', 'White sauce', '80g butter', '80g plain flour', '800ml milk', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1/2 teaspoon nutmeg', 'To assemble the lasagne', '300g lasagne sheets, dried or fresh', '200g grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
